title: Meeyal Sarees
subtitle: Traditional Elegance for Modern Times
mission: To preserve the rich heritage of Indian textiles while empowering artisans and weavers across the country.
vision: To be the most trusted destination for authentic and exquisite sarees that celebrate the diverse craftsmanship of India.
story: Meeyal Sarees began with a passion for preserving traditional Indian craftsmanship. Our founder, inspired by the intricate artistry of handloom sarees, embarked on a journey across India to discover unique weaving techniques passed down through generations. What started as a small collection has now grown into a curated showcase of India's finest textiles, each with a story to tell.

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: We source directly from artisans to ensure genuine handcrafted products.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We champion eco-friendly practices in production and packaging.

values.title: Community
values.description: We support weaver communities through fair trade practices.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We blend traditional techniques with contemporary designs.

process.description: We travel to remote villages to find the most skilled artisans.
Each saree is personally selected for its craftsmanship and design.
Rigorous testing ensures only the finest pieces reach our customers.
Your saree is carefully packaged and delivered to your doorstep.

team.name: Priya Sharma

team.name: Rajesh Patel
team.bio: Rajesh has built relationships with weaver communities in over 50 villages.

team.name: Anita Desai
